name: Snap Punch
help:
Delivers an attack to target.
Combo Action: True Strike
Combo Potency: 1,250
Combo Bonus: Grants Greased Lightning
Duration: 15s
Greased Lightning Bonus: Increases damage dealt by 5% and reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time by 5%
Greased Lightning III Bonus: Opens a chakra
